languages.text: {n}Ирлиэт опускает оружие, но ее плечи по прежнему напряжены. Наконец она переводит дух, плавным движением головы стряхивает выбившиеся волосы с лица и смотрит на вас.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ирлиэт опускает оружие, но ее плечи по прежнему напряжены. Наконец она переводит дух, плавным движением головы стряхивает выбившиеся волосы с лица и смотрит на вас.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yrliet lowers her weapon, but her shoulders remain tense. She finally catches her breath, shaking her hair out of her face in a fluid motion, and looks at you.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ирлиэт опускает оружие, но ее плечи по прежнему напряжены. Наконец она переводит дух, плавным движением головы стряхивает выбившиеся волосы с лица и смотрит на вас.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet lowers her weapon, but her shoulders remain tense and her eyes are fixed on Vistenza Vyatt's body, as if expecting the dead cultist to rise from the dead. She finally catches her breath, shaking her hair out of her face in a fluid motion, and looks at you.{/n}

{n}Yrliet lowers her weapon, but her shoulders remain tense. She finally catches her breath, shaking her hair out of her face in a fluid motion, and looks at you.{/n}
{n}Yrliet lowers her weapon, but her shoulders remain tense. She finally catches her breath, shaking her hair out of her face in a fluid motion, and looks at you.{/n}

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特放下了武器，但肩膀依然紧绷着。到最后，她终于喘了一大口气，干净利落地甩掉了脸上的头发，看着你。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet lowers her weapon, but her shoulders remain tense. She finally catches her breath, shaking her hair out of her face in a fluid motion, and looks at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特放下了武器，但肩膀依然紧绷着。到最后，她终于喘了一大口气，干净利落地甩掉了脸上的头发，看着你。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yrliet baja el arma, pero sus hombros siguen tensos. Finalmente recupera el aliento, se aparta el pelo de la cara con un movimiento fluido y te mira.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet lowers her weapon, but her shoulders remain tense. She finally catches her breath, shaking her hair out of her face in a fluid motion, and looks at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet baja el arma, pero sus hombros siguen tensos. Finalmente recupera el aliento, se aparta el pelo de la cara con un movimiento fluido y te mira.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ユリエットは武器を下ろしたが、両肩は緊張したままだ。やがて呼吸を整えると、流れるような動きで顔についた髪を振り払ってからこちらを見る。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet lowers her weapon, but her shoulders remain tense. She finally catches her breath, shaking her hair out of her face in a fluid motion, and looks at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットは武器を下ろしたが、両肩は緊張したままだ。やがて呼吸を整えると、流れるような動きで顔についた髪を振り払ってからこちらを見る。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yrliet senkt ihre Waffe, aber ihre Schultern bleiben angespannt. Schließlich beruhigt sich ihr Atem, sie streicht sich mit einer flüssigen Bewegung die Haare aus dem Gesicht und blickt dich an.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet lowers her weapon, but her shoulders remain tense. She finally catches her breath, shaking her hair out of her face in a fluid motion, and looks at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet senkt ihre Waffe, aber ihre Schultern bleiben angespannt. Schließlich beruhigt sich ihr Atem, sei streicht sich mit einer flüssigen Bewegung die Haare aus dem Gesicht und blickt dich an.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yrliet baisse son arme, mais ses épaules restent tendues. Elle finit par reprendre son souffle, secoue la tête d'un geste fluide pour écarter les cheveux qui sont tombés sur son visage, puis vous regarde.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet lowers her weapon, but her shoulders remain tense. She finally catches her breath, shaking her hair out of her face in a fluid motion, and looks at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet baisse son arme, mais ses épaules restent tendues. Elle finit par reprendre son souffle, secoue la tête d'un geste fluide pour écarter les cheveux qui sont tombés sur son visage, puis vous regarde.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yrliet silahını indirse de omuzları hâlâ gergin. Sonunda soluklanıyor, saçlarını akıcı bir hareketle yüzünden silkeliyor ve bakışlarını sana çeviriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet lowers her weapon, but her shoulders remain tense. She finally catches her breath, shaking her hair out of her face in a fluid motion, and looks at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet silahını indirse de omuzları hâlâ gergin. Sonunda soluklanıyor, saçlarını akıcı bir hareketle yüzünden silkeliyor ve bakışlarını sana çeviriyor.{/n}
